word: Christ declares, "I am the light of the world; he that followeth me shall not walk in darkness, but shall have the light of life." This light is all contained in the great commandment of love. "A new commandment I give unto you," Christ said, "that ye love one another; as I have loved you that ye also love one another." By this shall all men know that ye are my disciples, if ye have love one to another."
